participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, Emma loves connecting with people and sharing her passions.
participant_1.background: I'm an avid reader who enjoys reading books that motivate me to achieve my goals. I like bagels with everything on them. My favorite phone is an iPhone. My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love. I love adventure; that is why I have been a salesperson all my life.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, Jake loves thrilling experiences and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: I never start a fight, but I've been in my fair share of them. To stay in shape, I chase cheetahs at the zoo. I love eating out. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job is not very personally fulfilling. I was drafted last year by the Minnesota Wolves.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to be talking to you.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to chat with.
I'm glad to hear that! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to eat out, go to the zoo, and play video games.
Those all sound like fun activities! I like to read, go to concerts, and spend time with my family.
I love reading too! I'm an avid reader. What types of books do you like to read?
I like to read self-help books, motivational books, and historical fiction.
Those are all great genres! I like to read a variety of books, but I'm always looking for new recommendations.
I have a few good recommendations for you if you're interested!
I would love that! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Great! I'll send you a list of some of my favorites later.
Thanks! I can't wait to read them!
You're welcome! I hope you enjoy them.
